name: Twicefancast
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: twice fan cast
Developer Terms of Use
des:
We share live updates of famous Kpop star TWICE

We deliver daily updated news and issue of our beloved celebrity.

We will carefully look through your message and we will cast your message on this Skill![How to use]
You can say, “Alexa, open Twice fan cast” to hear the latest stories. While listening to a story, you can say ”Alexa, stop” to stop the story. You can continue to the next story by answering “Yes” to the question “Would you like to read the next post?""

Example phrase:
""Alexa, open Twice fan cast""

[Dialogue flow]
a. The Skill will play its welcome message upon hearing the user’s command, “Alexa, open Twice fan cast.""
b. The Skill will automatically play the most recent posting from the open Twice fan castguru board from wecast.ai.
c.After playing the most recent post, the Skill will ask “Would you like to read the next post?”
- If the listener says “Yes”, the Skill will play the next posting
- If the listener says “No”, the Skill will exit the Skill
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
